Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Great timing. I've got
something I need to talk to you about.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Look, be honest. Do you even still like
me?
<PAGE>
From the way you've been treating me
recently, I really don't think you do.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
My time is precious. If you aren't
interested then shall we just call it
quits?
<PAGE>
I think that would be best for both of
us. Don't you agree?
I still love you Allen
I want to break it off too

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I see.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>If that is the case, <MYNAME>, then I have
an order for you!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
You need to show your feelings for me a
little more. Understand?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<ACTION_HEART_BREAK>Okay then. So we're finished. From this
moment on, then, we're just friends.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's only one salon in town, so don't
feel like you have to stay away. I'm a
professional in my work.
<PAGE>
So long, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, <MYNAME>. I've been wanting to talk to
you about something. If you have a
moment?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Please, be honest with me. Do you still
think of my as your boyfriend?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
If you're thinking maybe you want to
break things off with me but don't have
the courage to do it, let's settle this.
<PAGE>
Should we split up? Should we just go
back to being friends?
I want to remain your girlfriend
Let's go back to being friends

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Okay, fine. So let's try and spend some
more time together? We do live in the
same town!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This can be a new starting point. We're
going to make it, I know we will! I'll
be here for you.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<ACTION_HEART_BREAK>Okay. I understand. We had some good
times, didn't we? Thank you.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now we'll just be farmer and pet store
owner again. A new relationship. I hope
it works out!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, my dear. I'm glad you're here. I
need to talk to you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm thinking our relationship has pretty
much run its course. Shall we split up?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This isn't an end. We'll just go back to
how things were before we started
dating.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I think that's for the best,
considering how things stand at the
moment. What do you think, <MYNAME>?
I don't want to break up
Let's split up

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Phew, thank goodness! I was actually
just joking. Sorry for messing about
with you like that!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I've just been so upset that you haven't
been spending much time with me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'll give you some pointers on things I
look out for, okay? I'm quite a
sensitive man, at heart!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay. Let's split up.
<PAGE>
<ACTION_HEART_BREAK>Thank you, <MYNAME>. I won't waste the
things I've learned from our time
together.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
We live in the same town so let's just
be good friends! I'll see you around!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. There you are.
<PAGE>
I need to talk to you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Do you think we should quit dating and
go back to being friends?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
We haven't exactly talked much recently,
have we. It isn't like we are much of a
couple.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>My feelings haven't changed. What about
you, though, <MYNAME>? Tell what you are
thinking, please!
I want to stay your girlfriend
Let's break up

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
If that's how you feel then there's no
reason to split. Let us continue our
relationship.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
But can I just say this, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
It's very important for us to nurture
the loving connection between us.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>You seem to have forgotten that
recently. Please take a little more care
on that.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I knew it. Your feelings have changed
since we started dating, haven't they?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><ACTION_HEART_BREAK>I understand. Then let us return to just
being friendly citizens of the same
town.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for everything you've done
for me. I hope you will find eternal
happiness!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>. It's you.
<PAGE>
Good timing. I've got something I need
to ask of you.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You don't think anything of me, do you?
So let's split up.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What's with the way you've been treating
me recently? You haven't come to see me
at all!
<PAGE>
If you want to split up then just come
out and say it! Say something!
I don't want to split up
I want to split up

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Great! Forget I said anything.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
But if that's really what you feel...
come and see me more often, would you?
I don't want to feel this way again.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Gah! I knew it.
<PAGE>
<ACTION_HEART_BREAK>We're finished. Let's forget everything
between us and go back to just being two
people in the same town.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Farewell, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>. Hi there.
<PAGE>
Have you got a moment? I need to talk
with you about an important matter.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>, do you want to split up with me?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
You can tell me the truth. Tell me what
you're feeling. Do you really love me?
I still love you Amir
I want to break up

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_PATI>
You do?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm so glad to hear that! I don't want
to break up with you either. <MYNAME>,
let's stay together.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
But you need to promise me something.
<PAGE>
If you really do love me, I need you to
show it a little more. Show it in the
way you act!
<PAGE>
I'm not as steadfast as I look!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_PATI>
Okay.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><ACTION_HEART_BREAK>I'm glad you told me the truth. I didn't
feel happy with the way things were.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's just be good friends from now on.
I'll see you around.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Hey, <MYNAME>. I'm glad you're here.
There's something I need to talk to you
face-to-face.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>. Do you think we should go back
to just being friends?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
It feels like you're treating me as your
friend more than your girlfriend. Do you
really love me?
I love you Tina
I want to go back to being friends

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Okay... I'm glad to hear that.
<PAGE>
It's just... you hardly come to see me
at all, <MYNAME>. I've been really
worried!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Please make sure you come and see me
more often, okay?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I can't stand all this anxiety!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I knew it. I knew it...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><ACTION_HEART_BREAK>I guess this means we're just friends
again.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm fine! No, honest, I'm fine! Let's
stay good friends.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I need to talk to you about something.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Tell me something. Do you think we
should just split up?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I'm busy practicing my magic and
everything, and you're busy running your
farm.
<PAGE>
I don't think we can balance work and
love effectively. Do you?
I can handle both.
I do need to focus on work...

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Thank goodness! I'm not sure what I'd
have said if you told me you wanted to
split up!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
It's just, you never come to see me,
do you? You don't treat me very well!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So I was just messing around with you,
to make you feel a bit sorry! I didn't
want to upset you.
<PAGE>
Just make sure you come to see me more
from now on? I'll be waiting for you! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sad, but okay... let's split up.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><ACTION_HEART_BREAK>Thank you for everything, <MYNAME>. Let's
both work our hardest, okay?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That brings our journey together to an
end. Do come and see my magic again!

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. I need to... talk. Okay?

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Let's... split up, okay?

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>. You never come... never come to
see me. 
<PAGE>
So let's just end this.
I'll come see you!
Yes, let's end this

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You will?
<PAGE>
Okay. We won't end things.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
But promise... promise me. You'll
definitely come and see me. Right?

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<ACTION_HEART_BREAK>...Okay.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Goodbye.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Hello. I need to talk to you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I've been thinking recently that maybe
we shouldn't be together.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I still have a long way to go before
I'm a master blacksmith. I need to
concentrate on my training.
<PAGE>
You have your own work on the farm too,
don't you. I don't want to get in the
way of that.
I want to stay your boyfriend
Let's break up

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I'm sorry I put you on the spot like
that. Please forget I said anything.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I've been feeling a little lost without
being able to see you very often.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'm okay now. I'd be honored to remain
your girlfriend.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Very well.
<PAGE>
<ACTION_HEART_BREAK>I'm sorry. I have been unable to support
you in your time of need.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Our relationship has meant a lot to me.
Thank you so much, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Let's remain friends from now on.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I'm glad to see you.
<PAGE>
I've got something I need to talk to
you about. Have you got a moment?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>...do you love me? Or have
those feelings passed?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You never come and see me. I'm starting
to feel like you don't love me at all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD><MYNAME>, do you want to go back to just
being friends?
I want to stay your boyfriend
Let's go back to being friends

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
That's great. Really, really great. I
thought we were finished for sure.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>. I know your work is hard.
<PAGE>
But I get so lonely when you don't come
to see me. Please try to make more time
for me!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I see.
<PAGE>
<ACTION_HEART_BREAK>At least I know how you feel,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Thank you for everything. We aren't
going to be dating any more, but let's
stay friends.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, my dear little <MYNAME>. Nice of you
to come by.
<PAGE>
Actually, this is quite good timing. I
need to talk to you about something.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Let's split up.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
You've hardly come to see me at all
recently, so my experiments aren't
getting anywhere!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>There's no point our being together,
then! Let's just split up.
I will come and see you!
I want to break up

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I've already made my mind up, though!
What should we do?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Okay, okay. I'll stay with you.
<PAGE>
But all the days you haven't come see
me mean there's lots of experiments
piling up. I need your help, quick!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've always been a smart one, <MYNAME>.
You understand how things work.
<PAGE>
<ACTION_HEART_BREAK>Even though we've broken up I still
welcome your participation in my
experiments.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll see you around, <MYNAME>. Come by any
time.
